title: venus-ionopause-analysis
subtitle: Comprehensive analysis and visualization of Pioneer Venus Orbiter ionopause crossings with 2D and 3D plots
description: This project processes ionopause crossing data from the Pioneer Venus Orbiter Electron Temperature Probe (OETP) dataset (1978-1992). It generates 25+ publication-grade 2D and 3D plots, including Venus-centered 3D visualizations of inbound and outbound crossings, and logs all plot outputs. Parallelized with MPI for efficiency.
